data.eml:eml: Blastosporiumpersicolor gen. et sp. nov., a new helotialean fungus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zheng, Hua, Zhang, ZhenNa, Wen, ZhiJia, F. Castaneda-Ruiz, Rafael, ZeFen Yu, (2019): Blastosporiumpersicolor gen. et sp. nov., a new helotialean fungus. MycoKeys 51: 55-64, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.51.30798, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.51.30798
